V_measurement.rationale: 6/10 debt dimensions measured (complexity, duplication, coverage, static, maintainability, reliability) + SQALE implementation
V_measurement.gaps: Missing architecture, performance, security, dependency debt

V_prioritization.rationale: Comprehensive value/effort matrix with business impact, ROI analysis, clear prioritization framework
V_prioritization.gaps: Could add more quantitative business value metrics

V_tracking.rationale: Baseline established and comparable, but no tracking infrastructure yet
V_tracking.gaps: No historical tracking, no trend analysis, no paydown velocity monitoring

V_actionability.rationale: Clear 4-phase paydown roadmap with effort estimates, sequencing, ROI, and expected outcomes
V_actionability.gaps: Could add dependency tracking between debt items

V_completeness.rationale: 4/6 methodology components documented (measurement, categorization, prioritization, paydown roadmap)
V_completeness.gaps: Missing prevention guidelines and tracking system design

V_effectiveness.rationale: Methodology not yet tested on different codebase
V_effectiveness.note: Need transfer test to calculate speedup

V_reusability.rationale: High potential (90%+ reusable components) but not yet validated through transfer test
V_reusability.note: Transfer test needed to validate transferability claims

meta_agent.rationale: Core capabilities sufficient for SQALE implementation

agent_set.rationale: SQALE domain expertise needed for debt quantification

iteration_assessment.primary_achievement: SQALE methodology implemented with comprehensive prioritization
iteration_assessment.primary_gap: Methodology needs effectiveness and reusability validation through transfer test
iteration_assessment.next_focus: Either improve V_tracking (tracking infrastructure) or validate V_effectiveness/V_reusability (transfer test)
